column4: echo ${base-dir} , would guess base dir is what you get when you type cd

the reason I ask is that I have this sh script and it is supposed to dl a package to ${base-dir}${packagename-dir} but the url failed, I want to put the file into that place and then continue the script
so if I were running the sh script in '/opt' then ${base-dir}${packagename-dir} would be here -->  /packagename-dir/   ... is this right?
